headerDisplay: For instructions on how to set up your BroadLink RM and Dyson BP01, [follow these instructions](https://github.com/jeremynoesen/homebridge-dyson-bp01#hardware-setup).

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter a name for the accessory. Changing this later will require you to [set up the fan again](https://github.com/jeremynoesen/homebridge-dyson-bp01#dyson-bp01-setup).

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: Enter the MAC address of the BroadLink RM you want to use. Leave this blank to automatically discover devices.
